content: knitting enables anyone to create luxurious and functional accessories for everyday wear patterns do not need to be complex to produce beautiful results the feather and fan pattern is a simple lace pattern consisting of four row which are repeated it knits up quickly and is a great pattern for those of you who dislike purl stitches or enjoy knitting in the round or are new to lace knitting it is the sort of stitch pattern that lends itself to many different applications growing up i watched my mother knit many afghans using this pattern and worsted weight yarn in lace weight yarn it creates a a dainty confection that is light weight yet warm this simple pattern knit in fine yarn produces a luxurious accessory that makes a wonderful gift as it only needs one skein 25g/200m i encourage you to splurge on nice yarn e g mohair and silk the cowl can be worn with or without a brooch/pin see pictures
